org.apache.flink.api.common.typeinfo

类 IntegerTypeInfo<T>

  • java.lang.Object

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, AtomicType<T>

    @Public
public class IntegerTypeInfo<T>
extends NumericTypeInfo<T>
    Type information for numeric integer primitive types: int, long, byte, short, character.
